description:
TAKE CONTROL OF YOUR MONEY 
Track your spending, view all your accounts in one place, and protect your cards from fraud and unwanted charges. Stay informed, aware and on top of your budget goals. 

It’s the fastest, easiest and most elegant way to manage your personal finances. 

THANKS TO YOU 
"Best Free Apps of 2014” - PCMag
"Best Apps of 2013" - TechCrunch 
"Best Apps To Manage Your Money" - CNNMoney 

BEAUTIFUL SPEND ANALYTICS 
See your spending by category over time like you’ve never seen it before. Make things fun by competing with yourself month over month. 

SMART SAVINGS ALERTS 
BillGuard searches the web for coupons that will lower your bills, based on your own spending patterns. Say hello to personalized savings alerts that save you real money at checkout - and goodbye to irrelevant offers. 

YOU SWIPE, IT LEARNS. 
BillGuard gets smarter with every new user. Each time you swipe to verify or flag a credit or debit card charge, BillGuard learns and improves for you. Community-edited merchant information makes it easy to recognize even the most cryptic bills. 

PEACE OF MIND 
Get alerted in real-time to unwanted and unauthorized charges. The world’s #1 grey charge protection service is now at your fingertips. 

DOING MONEY RIGHT 
“The best money management app I’ve used, by far. Monitors every expense and makes me feel in control.” - Jessica, Chicago 

“It’s a beautifully designed money manager. I saved $500 by simply tracking my charges more carefully.” - Pedro, San Francisco 

PASSBOOK SUPPORT 
Add any credit or debit card to Passbook for quick access to your balances and latest charges. 

BillGuard is powered with bank-level security to ensure your data is kept private and secure. No one - not even you - can move money with BillGuard. 

BillGuard works with more than 5,000 credit and bank accounts, including Chase, Bank of America, Citibank, Wells Fargo, HSBC, Capital One, BB&T, SunTrust, American Express, Discover and PayPal. 

Please contact us with any questions or feedback. We answer 24/7 at support@billguard.com and @BillGuard on Twitter.

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
trackCensoredName: BillGuard - Personal Finance app to track your money, budget and bills
trackName: BillGuard - Personal Finance app to track your money, budget and bills
releaseNotes:
Starting today, you’ll find it easier than ever to remember if you really did make a charge. Now your BillGuard includes locations for your transactions!

To edit a location, (1) tap on a transaction from your BillGuard; (2) tap on the "Location" or on "Tap to Add" (3) and then type an address or tap on "Online Transaction."
The 1st 5 people to email a screenshot of a transaction with a location to marinabg@billguard.com will win a free BillGuard t-shirt.

Thank you!
Marina B, @mboykis
Community Manager
